docs.snippet: Mr. HYATT was released to-day in consequence of the order of the Senate. He left Washington at once, very much enfeebled in health.

headline.main: LAW REPORTS.; Enforcement of the Sunday Law The German Theatres.ARGUMENT OF THE ATTACHEMENT. General Sessions. TRIAL OF KIMMELSTEIN FOR COMPLICITY IN THE KARPLES CASK A PERJURER SENT TO THE STATE PRISON FOR FIVE YEARS. Pistols and Practices CONTEMPT OF COURT. United States Circuit Court. Before Judge Smalley. docs.lead_paragraph: The Managers of the Association for the Reformation of Juvenile Delinquents vs. Harman This was the motion to punish the defendant, the proprietor of the German Stadt Theatre in this City, for keeping his theatre open on Sunday, in disobedience of an injunction order served upon him.

docs.snippet: The captured Africans at Key West occupied some of the attention of the Senate yesterday. The amendment of the House, increasing the appropriation for their maintainance and return to Africa, from $200,000 to $250,000, was rejected. On motion of Mr....
docs.lead_paragraph: The captured Africans at Key West occupied some of the attention of the Senate yesterday. The amendment of the House, increasing the appropriation for their maintainance and return to Africa, from $200,000 to $250,000, was rejected. On motion of Mr. WILSON tho Senate agreed to adjourn on the 25th, instead of the 18th, but as this was not concurred in by the House, it is

docs.snippet: The Niagara arrived here at 7  o'clock this evening. She has seventy-eight passengers for Boston, at which port she will be due early Friday morn

headline.main: FROM EUROPE.; Advices by the Niagara CONTINUED SUCCESSES OF GARIBALDI. The Royal Palace at Palermo Burned by the People. CHINESE AFFAIRS IN PARLIAMENT. GREAT BRITAIN. FRANCE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Niagara arrived here at 7 o'clock this evening. She has seventy-eight passengers for Boston, at which port she will be due early Friday morn
